preference.name: Scp0MaterialLabReport_PseudoFolder
preference.preference_description:
Specifies the list of properties that can be displayed as a pseudo folder under the node for the Scp0MaterialLabReport object.
Available OOTB properties: Scp0UsesMaterialMapping Scp0UsesLaboratory Scp0UsesSupplier Scp0UsesAnalyte Scp0LRDContactInCompany
